Question: Bill Engvall's character is affected by this person's rantings about witchcraft and voodoo in his pre-game warm-ups.
Hints: This person spent his early childhood in Clinton, Iowa, where he set forth the goal to play professional football.
This person decided to attend Louisiana Tech University in Ruston, Louisiana.
This person has in later years made light of the ridicule with quips such as "it's football, not rocket science.".
